scripts.dev:client: export NODE_ENV=DEV && cd client && npm run dev
scripts.dev:server: export NODE_ENV=DEV && cd server && npm run dev
scripts.dev: if ! command -v tmux ; then echo 'tmux is not installed! please run dev:client and dev:server separately!' >&2 && exit 1; fi && npm run dev:confirmed
scripts.dev:confirmed: tmux new-session -s 'CHANGEME (dev)' 'npm run dev:server' \; split-window 'npm run dev:client' \; select-layout even-horizontal \;
